text: Pedro Miguel Oliveira Ganhão (born 10 April 1984) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Casa Pia. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Carregado on 26 September 2009 in a game against Desportivo Aves. ==References== ==External links== Category:1984 births Category:People from Benavente, Portugal Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:LigaPro players Category:Casa Pia A.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Pedro Ganhão
